member.name: T:UnityPark.VersionFormat.IStringBuildable
member.summary: An interface for making types easier to build to string format.

member.summary: Gets a StringBuilder from the caller and uses it to append string information about the instance.
member.param: A StringBuilder instance to append data to.

member.summary: Utility class for building strings.

member.summary: Helps append a string containing information about a member to a StringBuilder.

member.summary: Signifies a type of build.

member.summary: Stable build, which has been released to the public.

member.summary: Beta build, which is a preview of the next stable.

member.summary: Custom build, which might have changes that will not enter into mainline releases.

member.name: T:uEcho.NetworkVersionBuild
member.summary: This enum shows what version of uLink build you have.

member.name: F:uEcho.NetworkVersionBuild.Alpha
member.summary: It's an Alpha build. It's not stable.

member.name: F:uEcho.NetworkVersionBuild.Beta
member.summary: This is a Beta and more stable than Alpha. This is waht we use before stable release.

member.name: F:uEcho.NetworkVersionBuild.Stable
member.summary: This is an stable released version. Good for production.

member.name: F:uEcho.NetworkVersionBuild.Custom
member.summary: This is a custom build prepared for you. This might have a quick hot fix, a specific feature or ...
